DOC.brief_summary: Objective : clarify predictive value brain natriuretic peptide ( BNP ) combination neutrophil gelatinase associate lipocalin ( NGAL ) prognosis patient sepsis .
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Value Dynamic Combination BNP NGAL Prognosis Patients With Sepsis
DOC.criteria: age ≥18 year < 85 year ; presence severe sepsis accord Survival Sepsis Campaign 10 ; patient voluntarily join study inform consent . participate trial within 30 day criteria trial meet ; expect die within 24 hour ; pregnant ; advanced malignancy life expectancy < 6 month ; history congestive heart failure ; chronic renal dysfunction ( baseline creatinine > 176.8μmol/L ) ; relatives unwilling agree use full life support .
